channel.title: Black Mesa server hosting dedicated or shared?
channel.description:
Hey, im back to Black Mesa after long time and i took some friends with me :smiley: . So we would like to setup a server and just have fun. I want to have good experience and not having lags and other issues with the server and that's why i thought of a dedicated server that will cost (i guess) anything from $30-50 per month while my friends insist that shared will be alright (WTF just 2 hosts they offer black meas servers? [url]https://nazeboo.com/server-hosting/black-mesa-server-hosting/[/url] ).
What you suggest guys? The cost of the server is not a problem, i just want to work smooth and of course i would't like to pay more for the same thing!

item.title: Black Mesa server hosting dedicated or shared?

item.description:
You’re welcome

Thanks i go look in to it right away! THANKS

item.source: Black Mesa server hosting dedicated or shared?

item.title: Black Mesa server hosting dedicated or shared?
item.dc:creator: Awesomeness_0714
item.description:
Hi!

I recommend to have a dedicated server, so you can install whatever you want.
For example, you can setup Black Mesa Dedicated Server with a TeamSpeak server
I personally use Linode as hosting and I’m totally happy with it. I have no problems running multiple servers with the 1 GB plan, that costs 10$

Cheers.

Read full topic
